title: Bench-Mount & Portable Punches & Die Sets; Tool Type: Portable Hand Punch w/ Punch & Die Set; Container Type: Case; Minimum Punch Size: 3; Maximum Punch Size: 20; Material: Steel; Overall Length: 5.5 in; For Use With: Shim Stock
body_html:
Item #: 04965000
Brand: Precision Brand
Model #: 40399

Product Specifications

Tool Type Portable Hand Punch w/ Punch & Die Set
Container Type Case
Minimum Punch Size 3
Maximum Punch Size 20
Material Steel
Overall Length 5.5 in
For Use With Shim Stock
Insulated No
Tether Style Not Tether Capable
Includes Ten punch sizes: 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 10, 12, 16, and 20mm. Nine I.D. pilot sizes: 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 10, 12, and 16mm. Custom fit, sturdy, steel die stand provides solid support for consistent shim and washer fabricating. Elevated die allows punches to fall clean, reduces shim burrs, and decreases possible damage to punches. Precision Brand TruPunch punch & die set makes perfect, custom washers, shims, and gaskets in seconds by using its exclusive, patented punch, pilot, and pin system. No guess work is needed to center the I.D. and there is no need to scribe center lines. Material waste is reduced by creating a perfect shim every time. Packaged in a durable plastic case. Set includes TruPunch punch & die set and stand.
Number Of Pieces 21
UNSPSC Code 27111500
